text: The Lordsburg Hidalgo County Museum is located in Lordsburg, New Mexico. It features a World War II Internment and POW exhibit and a Hidalgo County Cattle Growers Association Hall of Fame Room. Other exhibits include mining, rocks and minerals, antique tools, area ranching heritage, bottles and railroads. ==External links== *Hidalgo County Museums official website Category:Cowboy halls of fame Category:Halls of fame in New Mexico Category:Military and war museums in New Mexico Category:Museums in Hidalgo County, New Mexico Category:Natural history museums in New Mexico
title: Lordsburg Hidalgo County Museum
